item.title: From Silicon Valley to Soccer Moms: The Microdosing Revolution üåüüí°
item.description: Explore the growing trend of microdosing LSD and psilocybin mushrooms. From tech innovators in Silicon Valley to everyday soccer moms, discover how people are using these psychedelics to boost creativity, enhance mental health, and inspire new ideas. üåüüí°üçÑ
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: The Risks and Safety Considerations of Psychedelics like LSD and DMT
item.description: Exploring the multifaceted aspects of safety when using psychedelics such as LSD and DMT, including mental health considerations, legal implications, and harm reduction practices.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: Exploring the History and Mystical Legacy of Ergot
item.description: Unravel the rich history and mystical allure of ergot, a powerful fungus that has influenced cultures, inspired religious rituals, and led to groundbreaking scientific discoveries. Combining ancient wisdom with modern science, this article illuminates ergots past, present, and future potential.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)
